title: The Heart - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/20/21
itunes:title: The Heart - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/20/21
description:
George Noory and author Howard Martin explore his research into how the heart has a type of intelligence that operates like the brain and can give us insight and good health and even intuition on how to live our lives.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: A discussion on the connection between the human heart and emotional well being.
